name: project
description: A web scraping tool built with Puppeteer and TypeScript for extracting property tax information from the Travis Central Appraisal District (TCAD) website.

scripts.scrape:batch: cd server && doppler run -- npm run scrape:batch
scripts.scrape:batch:cities: cd server && doppler run -- npm run scrape:batch:cities
scripts.scrape:batch:zipcodes: cd server && doppler run -- npm run scrape:batch:zipcodes
scripts.scrape:batch:comprehensive: cd server && doppler run -- npm run scrape:batch:comprehensive
scripts.db:stats: doppler run -- psql tcad_scraper -c 'SELECT COUNT(*) as total_properties, COUNT(DISTINCT city) as cities FROM properties;'
